title: Irelia, The Defiant Blade: Splash Art & Login Music Teaser

embed.description: A new teaser video is out on Riot social media, showing off the splash art and login theme for the Irelia Champion Update! Continue reading for more information! Irelia Login Music & Splash Here is the full splash, taken from the video: For more on Irelia, check out these links:

body:
I've got to say... the splash, the music, and the Avatar-vibe teaser from yesterday have got me hyped for this.

If there's one thing Riot does well with their money, it's creating music and building up hype.

I used to main Irelia, and have not been as excited for a release of something, excluding the Eve rework and [*fingers crossed*] an Ultimate/Legendary Eve skin.

Good job Riot :D
{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

replies.body: yeah maybe now she will start to get skins.... bout time
